body_html: Yes, for the backward RNN it will internally reverse the input sequences up to a specified length (per sequence for the given batch) and reverse then this output to produce the backward output which is then concatenated with the forward output, so the padding will be correct. The unit test should make this clear once the code is pushed.

body: Yes, for the backward RNN it will internally reverse the input sequences up to a specified length (per sequence for the given batch) and reverse then this output to produce the backward output which is then concatenated with the forward output, so the padding will be correct. The unit test should make this clear once the code is pushed.
